resources.string: Become the pub quiz master with our selection of general knowledge questions!

To start a new quiz tap \"New Quiz\". Fill in the number of questions that you want to answer, from 1 to 20. Tap \"Start\" and you will be given random questions to answer. If you do not know an answer to a question just tap \"skip\". \n\nAt the end of the quiz you will be presented with your score and the correct answers for each question. If you want to try again with a new set of questions tab \"Try again\".
